snippet: Officials said 114 people who had come into contact with Dr. Craig Spencer at Bellevue Hospital Center had been watched for 21 days.
abstract: Twenty-one-day monitoring period ends for last of health care workers exposed to Dr Craig Spencer, New York City's only Ebola patient.
lead_paragraph: Officials said 114 people who had come into contact with Dr. Craig Spencer at Bellevue Hospital Center had been watched for 21 days.

headline.main: Monitoring for Those Exposed to New York Ebola Patient Ends
headline.print_headline: Monitoring for Those Exposed to Ebola Patient Ends
